name: Code App Source
subtitle: A full-fledged code editor for iPad
description:
Code App brings desktop-like editing experience to iPad. Features include:

• Version Control (Git)
• Embedded terminal
• Local web development environment (Node + PHP)
• Built-in Python runtime
• C/C++ Runtime with WebAssembly
• Local Java (OpenJDK)
• SSH Support
• LSP support (Python & Java)

apps.name: Code App
apps.subtitle: A full-fledged code editor for iPad
apps.versionDescription: Latest release of Code App for iPad
apps.localizedDescription: Code App is a powerful code editor for iPad that brings desktop-like editing experience to your tablet. It supports multiple programming languages, version control, and various development tools.

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Access to Photo Library is required to save images.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Code App needs access to your local network to discover and connect to development servers.
privacy.NSDocumentsFolderUsageDescription: Code App needs access to your documents to open and save code files.

versions.localizedDescription: Latest release of Code App for iPad
